A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for opening the key, such as where the key is opened from (machine or user storage) and whether to suppress UI prompting.

Docs.summary: Creates a symmetric 3DES decryptor object with the current key and initialization vector ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會解密加密的訊息建立使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateEncryptor>多載相同的簽章。

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateDecryptor (byte[] rgbKey, byte[] rgbIV);

Public Overrides Function CreateDecryptor (rgbKey As Byte(), rgbIV As Byte()) As ICryptoTransform

abstract member CreateDecryptor : byte[] * byte[] -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform override this.CreateDecryptor : byte[] * byte[] -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform

Docs.param: The secret key to use for the 3DES algorithm. The key size must be 192 bits.
The initialization vector to use for the 3DES algorithm.
Docs.summary: Creates a symmetric 3DES decryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會解密加密的訊息建立使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateEncryptor%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Byte%5B%5D%29>多載相同的簽章。
> [!NOTE] > 如果您已建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng>物件使用的現有保存索引鍵和您想要使用的金鑰解密訊息時，您想要設定<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV%2A>屬性並無參數然後呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateDecryptor>相反地，否則多載使用這個方法會建立暫時的金鑰所指定`rgbKey`參數。

Docs.exception: is not a valid size for this algorithm. -or- size does not match the block size for this algorithm.
is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used. -or- is .

public: override System::Security::Cryptography::ICryptoTransform ^ CreateEncryptor();

Docs.summary: Creates a symmetric 3DES encryptor object using the current key and initialization vector ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來加密訊息，然後使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateDecryptor%2A>多載相同的簽章來解密此方法的結果。

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor (byte[] rgbKey, byte[] rgbIV);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor(unsigned int8[] rgbKey, unsigned int8[] rgbIV) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateEncryptor (rgbKey As Byte(), rgbIV As Byte()) As ICryptoTransform
public: override System::Security::Cryptography::ICryptoTransform ^ CreateEncryptor(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbKey, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbIV);
abstract member CreateEncryptor : byte[] * byte[] -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform override this.CreateEncryptor : byte[] * byte[] -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform

Docs.param: The secret key to use for the 3DES algorithm. The key size must be 192 bits.
The initialization vector to use for the 3DES algorithm.
Docs.summary: Creates a symmetric 3DES encryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用這個方法來加密訊息，然後使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateDecryptor%2A>多載相同的簽章來解密此方法的結果。
> [!NOTE] > 如果您已建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng>物件使用的現有保存索引鍵和您想要使用的金鑰加密的訊息時，您想要設定<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV%2A>屬性並無參數然後呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateEncryptor>相反地，否則多載使用這個方法會建立暫時的金鑰所指定`rgbKey`參數。

Docs.exception: is not a valid size for this algorithm. -or- size does not match the block size for this algorithm.
is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used. -or- is .

MemberSignature.Value: public override byte[] Key { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8[] Key
Public Overrides Property Key As Byte()
public: virtual property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Key { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };
member this.Key : byte[] with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the key for the algorithm.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果您已建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng>物件使用的現有保存金鑰，當您讀取的值時<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.Key%2A>屬性將進行嘗試匯出金鑰。 在此情況下，如果索引鍵不是可匯出、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>就會擲回。
除了，如果您設定的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.Key%2A>屬性，將無法再使用保存的金鑰和將改為使用暫存索引鍵。 如果您需要使用一次，持續性索引鍵的新執行個體<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng>必須先建立類別。

MemberSignature.Value: public override int KeySize { get; set; }
.property instance int32 KeySize
Public Overrides Property KeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int KeySize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.KeySize : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.
Docs.value: 演算法使用之祕密金鑰的大小 (以位元為單位)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您已建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng>物件使用的現有保存金鑰和設定的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.KeySize%2A>屬性，將無法再使用保存的金鑰和將改為使用暫存索引鍵。 如果您需要使用一次，持續性索引鍵的新執行個體<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng>必須先建立類別。
